title: First Look: Lightweight’s $10k Fernweg Evo Pro Aero Road Wheels Lose 130 Grams
content:
Anyone got a spare $10,895 USD hanging about, also looking to save a few grams and watts? Look no further.

Read the full article at First Look: Lightweight’s $10k Fernweg Evo Pro Aero Road Wheels Lose 130 Grams on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
